channel.title: python on Even - A super concise theme for Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in python on Even - A super concise theme for Hugo

item.title: ubuntu 安装python3.8
item.description: 下载源码 1 wget https://www.python.org/ftp/python/3.8.0/Python-3.8.0.tgz 解压源码 1 tar -xvzf Python-3.8.0.tgz 进入目录 1 cd Python-3.8.0 配置安装路径 1 ./configure --with-ssl --prefix=/usr/local/python3 安装python3.8依赖 1 2 3 4 # sudo apt-get update # sudo apt-get upgrade # sudo apt-get dist-upgrade sudo apt-get install build-essential python-dev python-setuptools python-pip python-smbus libncursesw5-dev
